TEXT.TITLE: NORTHGATE <NGX> NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Northgate Exploration Ltd said it appointed John Kearney as president of the company, effective immediately. A company spokesman said Patrick Hughes, who previously was both president and chairman, will continue as chairman and chief executive officer. Kearney had been executive vice-president of Northgate. Reuter
